title: Ranked game problems
body: I disconnected twice in a row in ranked game and it won't let me reconnect. I lost so many LP. Anyone knows the issue?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is losing comms with the game server, and kicking you off.  I suggest going through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your strength.  Let me know if you have any questions!
